content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft the blackstone wall, I need to move all the blackstone blocks into the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move 1 blackstone block from slot 11 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I will move another blackstone block from slot 11 to slot 2, which is directly to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I will move another blackstone block from slot 11 to slot 3, which is directly to the right of slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: Now, I will move a blackstone block from slot 11 to slot 4, which is directly below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: Next, I will move a blackstone block from slot 11 to slot 5, which is directly below slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last blackstone block from slot 11 to slot 6, which is directly below slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blackstone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone_wall", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "mushroom_stem", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that the blackstone wall has been crafted, I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
